Class GamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.GamePanel

  • public class GamePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    JPanel on which game play takes place.
    Author:
    Roger

      • GamePanel

        public GamePanel​(int w,
                 int h)
        Constructor the Game Panel. Initializes all the class fields and sets images.
        Parameters:
        w - width of the screen. Passed to the #width variable of the class.
        h - height of the screen. Passed to the #height variable of the class.
